articles.description: The hosts of the U19 World Cups - men's and women's - have been identified, while the men's ODI World Cup has been expanded to 14 teams from 2027
articles.content: "The government representative was clear in his support for the ICC constitution including in principle for women's cricket in Afghanistan," Imran Khwaja said  •  Afghanistan Cricket Board

articles.description: Speaking of the semi-final clash, England openers Jos Buttler (80*) and Alex Hales (86*) made a mockery of the 169-run target as they took their side across the line in just 16 overs and ten wickets in hand.

articles.author: Marc Raimondi
articles.title: Alex Pereira stuns Israel Adesanya by TKO to claim UFC title - ESPN India
articles.description: Alex Pereira proved he still has Israel Adesanya's number, rallying to stop him in the final round Saturday night to win the UFC middleweight title.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- Alex Pereira had Israel Adesanya's number in kickboxing. He has it in MMA too.
Pereira, the only man to ever knock out Adesanya, stopped him again via TKO at 2 minutes, 1 second of the f… [+3458 chars]
